item1: Sysco Corporation, acting through its subsidiaries divisions, largest global distributor food related products primarily foodservice food-away-from-home industry. purpose “Connecting World Share Food Care One Another.” provided products related services approximately 730,000 customer locations, including restaurants, healthcare educational facilities, lodging establishments other foodservice customers during fiscal 2025. Founded 1969, Sysco commenced operations public company March 1970 when stockholders nine companies exchanged stock Sysco common stock. Since formation, grown $115 million all-time high $81.4 billion annual sales fiscal 2025, both through internal expansion existing operations acquisitions.
